summary: Adds a big slow Crossbow to the game so you can pretend to be that chick from Darkest Dungeons.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a giant crossbow to the game that deals 1.5x damage compared to the improved Dwarven Crossbow, and is 1.5x as heavy, while taking 2x as long to reload.  It also ignores some armor like the improved Crossbows.  

You need 7 dwarven ingots to make it, and it needs one to be improved.  It has full keyword support and currently can only be obtained via smithing, but you don't need any perks to be able to build it.
author: Harby94
